Translations.Text: Atahpara tini seguloke curna-bicurna kare dilena odera pradhanati byatitah yate tara tamra kache pratyabartana kare.
Tara balalah amadera upasyadera sathe erupa byabahara ke karala? Se to niscaya'i kona jalima.
Kataka loke balalah amara eka yubakake tadera samparke birupa alocana karate sunechi; take ibrahima bala haya.
Tara balalah take janasamakse upasthita kara, yate tara dekhe.
Tara balalah he ibrahima tumi'i ki amadera upasyadera sathe erupa byabahara karecha
tini balalenah na edera e'i pradhana'i to ekaja kareche. Ata'eba taderake jijnesa kara, yadi tara katha balate pare.
Atahpara mane mane cinta karala ebam balalah loka sakala; tomara'i be inasapha.
Atahpara tara jhumke gela mastaka nata kare, tumi to jana ye, era katha bale na
tini balalenah tomara ki allahara paribarte emana kichura ebadata kara, ya tomadera kona upakara o karate pare na ebam ksati'o karate pare na
dhika tomadera jan'ye ebam tomara allaha byatita yadera'i ebadata kara, odera jan'ye. Tomara ki bojha na
tara balalah eke puriye da'o ebam tomadera upasyadera sahayya kara, yadi tomara kichu karate ca'o.
Ami balalamah he agni, tumi ibrahimera upara sitala o nirapada haye ya'o.
Tara ibrahimera birud'dhe phandi amtate ca'ila, atahpara ami taderake'i sarbadhika ksatigrastha kare dilama.
Ami tamke o lutake ud'dhara kare se'i dese paumchiye dilama, yekhane ami bisbera jan'ye kalyana rekhechi.
Ami take dana karalama isahaka o puraskara sbarupa dilama iyakuba ebam pratyekake'i satkarma parayana karalama.
